forecast.day_comments: A chance of snow, mainly before 3am.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 17. Calm wind.  Chance of precipitation is 30%. Total nighttime snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: Partly sunny, with a high near 22. Calm wind becoming southwest around 6 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 21 mph.
